page.title: 05River Leven
page.content:
The River Leven full of fish, put them back they're not for you! Get a rod, get a net, catch a fish but don't get wet, Walk along the river side, watch the fishes running by! The ducks come swimming by, on the top of the river lie, The fish start rising everywhere, fishermen catch them right there!
The Village Hall is one of the main assets of the village, it has been in regular use since 1927 when it was built. It was even used in the war (1939_45) by the army to live in. The committee arrange a Pantomime each year, there have been 38 pantomimes. This year 1985 they performed "Ali Baba".
